home.metaTitle: Attorney Moran Sudry Hen | Labor Law, Torts, National Insurance & Mediation
home.metaDescription: Attorney Moran Sudry Hen Law Office specializing in labor law, torts, national insurance, power of attorney & mediation. Over 15 years of experience, personal and professional guidance.
home.heroSubtitle: Labor Law | Torts | National Insurance | Power of Attorney | Mediation
home.heroDescription: When a legal crisis meets real life, you need an attorney who understands both the law and the person behind it.
home.ctaTitle: When it comes to your rights, don't stand alone.

about.metaDescription: Attorney Moran Sudry Hen over 15 years of experience in labor law, torts, and national insurance. Personal and professional guidance at the most meaningful moments.
about.ogDescription: Over 15 years of experience in labor law, torts, and national insurance.
about.heroDescription: With over 15 years of experience, guiding clients through the most significant legal and personal moments of their lives.
about.bio1: With over 15 years of experience, Moran Sudry Hen specializes in labor law, torts, and national insurance, guiding clients through the most significant legal and personal moments of their lives.
about.bio2: She began her career as an associate at a large firm in Jerusalem, working across various legal fields. She later specialized in torts, and after moving to Tel Aviv, also practiced immigration law where she established a torts department, became a partner, and opened a labor law department.
about.bio3: For the past 10 years, she has been running her own private practice, representing clients in complex tort cases, national insurance claims, and labor law for both employees and employers.
about.bio4: Over the years, Moran has served diverse populations, including the ultra-Orthodox community in national insurance and tort claims, employees and employers, accident victims, and individuals dealing with complex medical conditions.
about.bio5: Her broad experience, combined with deep human understanding, allows her to lead cases with sensitivity yet with uncompromising legal determination.

laborEmployees.metaTitle: Labor Law for Employees Termination, Hearings, Rights
laborEmployees.metaDescription: Were you fired? Called to a hearing? Attorney Moran Sudry Hen specializes in employee rights with 15+ years of experience. Personal and professional guidance.
laborEmployees.ogTitle: Labor Law for Employees | Moran Sudry Hen Attorney
laborEmployees.ogDescription: Representing employees in termination, hearings, deterioration of conditions, and full rights realization.
laborEmployees.heroSubtitle: Feel like your rights are being trampled and you don't know where to start?
laborEmployees.heroDescription: Your rights aren't given, they're granted to you by law.
laborEmployees.intro1: There are moments in your career when the ground shifts. A hearing summons. A termination letter. Deterioration of conditions. Or a vague feeling that something illegal is happening but you have no idea how to prove it.
laborEmployees.intro2: And at those moments, the inner voice almost always appears: "Maybe it's better to give up..." / "It's uncomfortable..." / "I don't want trouble..."
laborEmployees.intro3: But the truth? Your rights aren't given, they're granted to you by law.
laborEmployees.situationsTitle: Situations Where Employees Turn to Me

situations.5: Return from maternity leave with role damage

laborEmployees.keyMessage: "In each of these cases, the gap between 'what they tell you' and 'what you deserve' can be tens to hundreds of thousands of shekels."
laborEmployees.whyActTitle: Why It's Important to Act Now
laborEmployees.whyActSubtitle: Because every conversation, every email, and every document changes the legal picture. Early consultation allows:
laborEmployees.personalQuote: "I guide employees through their most sensitive moments: fear, confusion, anger, and uncertainty. My goal isn't just to manage a case but to restore your control, confidence, and a fair outcome."
laborEmployees.ctaTitle: If you're facing a hearing, termination, or employment crisis, don't wait for the moment after.

laborEmployers.metaTitle: Labor Law for Employers Counsel, Contracts, Legal Defense
laborEmployers.metaDescription: Employee suing? Worried about legal exposure? Moran Sudry Hen provides employers with ongoing counsel, employment contracts, hearings, and claim defense.
laborEmployers.ogTitle: Labor Law for Employers | Moran Sudry Hen Attorney
laborEmployers.ogDescription: Comprehensive legal support for employers prevention, counsel, and defense.
laborEmployers.heroSubtitle: Worried you're legally exposed even though you acted in good faith?
laborEmployers.heroDescription: Managing employees isn't just an administrative task, it's also a heavy legal responsibility.
laborEmployers.intro: Many employers come to me only when the lawsuit has already been filed. But then it turns out the problem started much earlier: an imprecise contract. An undocumented hearing. A vague job description. Or an attempt to "be fair" without legal protection.
laborEmployers.keyMessage: "A single lawsuit can cost hundreds of thousands of shekels and damage the business's reputation too."
laborEmployers.servicesSubtitle: The goal: not just to defend when there's a problem but to prevent it in advance.
laborEmployers.ctaTitle: Protect your business before there's a problem.

torts.metaTitle: Torts Work Accidents, Road Accidents, Personal Injury
torts.metaDescription: Injured in an accident? Attorney Moran Sudry Hen specializes in torts work accidents, road accidents, personal injury & insurance claims. Professional guidance to compensation.
torts.ogTitle: Torts & Personal Injury | Moran Sudry Hen Attorney
torts.ogDescription: Representing accident victims work, road, personal injury & insurance claims.
torts.heroTitle: Injured in an accident and life stopped for a moment?
torts.heroDescription: An accident doesn't just hurt the body. It affects your routine. Your livelihood. Your family. And your basic sense of security.
torts.intro: And suddenly, instead of focusing on recovery you have to deal with insurance, forms, investigations, and insurance companies.
torts.keyMessage: "The goal is one: to get you the compensation you deserve, not the one they offer you."
torts.repSubtitle: Because insurance companies and large organizations act with a clear interest: to pay as little as possible.
torts.ctaTitle: You deserve fair compensation, not a low offer.

nationalInsurance.metaTitle: National Insurance Disability, Medical Committees, Rights
nationalInsurance.metaDescription: Dealing with National Insurance? Attorney Moran Sudry Hen specializes in general disability, medical committees, loss of earning capacity, and full rights realization.
nationalInsurance.ogTitle: National Insurance | Moran Sudry Hen Attorney
nationalInsurance.ogDescription: Representation in National Insurance disability, medical committees & rights.
nationalInsurance.heroTitle: Dealing with a medical condition and a system that doesn't always see you?
nationalInsurance.heroDescription: A medical struggle is hard enough on its own. But dealing with National Insurance can be no less exhausting.
nationalInsurance.intro: Forms. Committees. Rejections. Percentages that don't reflect reality. People who come to me usually come after trying on their own. And only then they understand how much professional representation changes the picture.
nationalInsurance.keyMessage: "National Insurance is a right, not a favor."
nationalInsurance.ctaTitle: Your medical condition requires attention from the legal side too.

powerOfAttorney.metaTitle: Continuing Power of Attorney Legal Planning for the Future
powerOfAttorney.metaDescription: A continuing power of attorney lets you decide in advance who will make decisions for you. Attorney Moran Sudry Hen guides the process simply and sensitively.
powerOfAttorney.ogTitle: Continuing Power of Attorney | Moran Sudry Hen Attorney
powerOfAttorney.ogDescription: Legal planning for the future with peace, confidence, and control.
powerOfAttorney.heroTitle: Plan for the future out of love, not fear
powerOfAttorney.heroSubtitle: Plan for the future while you're still in control.
powerOfAttorney.heroDescription: A continuing power of attorney lets you decide in advance: who will make decisions for you, how your affairs will be managed, and what happens in case of incapacity.
powerOfAttorney.realQuestionTitle: The real question isn't "what will happen"
powerOfAttorney.realQuestionP1: But "who will decide for me and how." If one day, for medical or other reasons, you can't make decisions yourself, who will take care of you? Who will handle finances? Who will make medical decisions? And who will ensure your wishes are respected?
powerOfAttorney.realQuestionP2: And the quieter question: will the children get along... or will the situation create tensions and arguments?
powerOfAttorney.controlTitle: Continuing Power of Attorney Control Even When It's Hard

controlItems.0: Choose who will handle your affairs in the future
controlItems.1: Decide how your finances will be managed
controlItems.3: Leave clear instructions for your family

powerOfAttorney.familyTitle: Why This Is Especially Important for Family
powerOfAttorney.familyIntro: When there are no clear instructions:

familyItems.0: Children may disagree with each other
familyItems.1: Medical decisions are made under pressure
familyItems.3: And sometimes it even reaches court

powerOfAttorney.familyConclusion: A continuing power of attorney removes the uncertainty. It preserves your dignity and keeps peace in the family.
powerOfAttorney.loveTitle: It's not a cold legal document, it's a document of love
powerOfAttorney.loveP1: Many people aged 70+ say: "I'm doing this for the kids." / "I don't want them to argue." / "I want it to be clear to them what I want."
powerOfAttorney.loveP2: It's a gift of certainty. Of peace. Of parental responsibility even at an older age.
powerOfAttorney.processSubtitle: No pressure. No complexity. At a pace that suits you.

0.title: Clear & Simple Explanation
0.description: An introductory meeting where we explain the process in clear language.

1.title: Defining Wishes & Instructions
1.description: What's important to you? What are your wishes? How would you like your affairs managed?

2.title: Choosing Power of Attorney Holders
2.description: Choosing the people who will act on your behalf in medical, financial, and personal matters.

3.title: Drafting the Document
3.description: Writing a precise legal document that accurately reflects your wishes.

4.title: Signing & Legal Approval
4.description: Signing in the presence of a certified attorney and registration as required.

powerOfAttorney.warningTitle: It's not too early but sometimes it can be too late.
powerOfAttorney.warningText: A continuing power of attorney can only be made when a person is competent and understands. Therefore, it's important to arrange it in time out of choice, not necessity.
powerOfAttorney.ctaTitle: Let's take care of the future together, peacefully, with confidence.

mediation.metaDescription: Business, family, and employer-employee mediation. Attorney Moran Sudry Hen guides mediation processes with a professional and human approach.
mediation.ogDescription: Professional mediation for efficient and respectful dispute resolution.
mediation.heroDescription: Not every dispute needs to reach the courtroom. Mediation allows you to resolve conflicts in a respectful, efficient, and cost-effective way.
mediation.intro: Mediation is a process where a neutral third party helps the sides reach an agreement. Unlike lengthy and expensive legal proceedings, mediation enables a quick resolution that preserves relationships.
mediation.keyMessage: "Good mediation doesn't just solve the problem, it preserves the relationship."
mediation.benefitsSubtitle: Mediation offers significant advantages over litigation:
mediation.ctaTitle: Want to resolve a dispute without going to court?
